text: @Mike_Pence While Joe Biden supports the law, including the CONSTITUTIONAL RIGHTS of women, your Administration has stood without apology for the deaths from COVID-19 of 142,000 Americans. You will always fight to protect the racist traitor statues. Hypocrisy at its finest.
